mapper.insert: insert into dms_device_purchase (purchase_code, purchase_name, purchase_agent, purchase_reason, purchase_payment_type, purchase_date, purchase_remark) values (#{purchase.purchaseCode}, #{purchase.purchaseName}, #{purchase.purchaseAgent}, #{purchase.purchaseReason}, #{purchase.purchasePaymentType}, #{purchase.purchaseDate}, #{purchase.purchaseRemark})

insert into dms_device_purchase_detail (purchase_code, device_code, device_name, device_model, device_spec, device_brand, purchase_function, purchase_unit_price, purchase_number, purchase_date) values (#{purchaseDetail.purchaseCode}, #{purchaseDetail.deviceCode}, #{purchaseDetail.deviceName}, #{purchaseDetail.deviceModel}, #{purchaseDetail.deviceSpec}, #{purchaseDetail.deviceBrand},#{purchaseDetail.purchaseFunction}, #{purchaseDetail.purchaseUnitPrice}, #{purchaseDetail.purchaseNumber}, #{purchaseDetail.purchaseDate} )
mapper.select: SELECT id, purchase_code, purchase_name, purchase_agent, purchase_reason, purchase_payment_type, purchase_date, purchase_remark FROM dms_device_purchase

SELECT id, purchase_code, device_code, device_name, device_model, device_spec, device_brand, purchase_function, purchase_unit_price, purchase_number, purchase_date FROM dms_device_purchase_detail WHERE purchase_code = #{purchaseCode}
mapper.update: UPDATE dms_device_purchase SET purchase_name = #{devicePurchase.purchaseName}, purchase_agent = #{devicePurchase.purchaseAgent}, purchase_payment_type = #{devicePurchase.purchasePaymentType}, purchase_date = #{devicePurchase.purchaseDate}, purchase_remark = #{devicePurchase.purchaseRemark} WHERE id = #{devicePurchase.id}
